Tokens.innerText:
You wake up, floating. It's dark. Where are you? Can't remember. Is this death? You move your arm, feel water splash. Not death. Sensory deprivation tank. The hatch is above you. Could probably OPEN it.
[[OPEN ->Garage]]

tokens.text: You wake up, floating. It's dark. Where are you? Can't remember. Is this death? You move your arm, feel water splash. Not death. Sensory deprivation tank. The hatch is above you. Could probably OPEN it.

Tokens.innerText: You search the desk, opening all the drawers. There’s a NOTE, long string of numbers written on it. There’s a tape player, which you could USE to play the TAPE. There’s a GUN.(set: $look_desk to true)
Tokens.text: [You search the desk, opening all the drawers. There’s a NOTE, long string of numbers written on it. There’s a tape player, which you could USE to play the TAPE. There’s a GUN.(set: $look_desk to true)]

tokens.text: You search the desk, opening all the drawers. There’s a NOTE, long string of numbers written on it. There’s a tape player, which you could USE to play the TAPE. There’s a GUN.

Tokens.innerText: (set: $look_shelf to true) Shelves are organized with a sequence of labels, reading AA, AB, AC, etc. down to ZZ. You look at the shelf next to you. Someone left a key FOB there.
Tokens.text: [(set: $look_shelf to true) Shelves are organized with a sequence of labels, reading AA, AB, AC, etc. down to ZZ. You look at the shelf next to you. Someone left a key FOB there.]

tokens.text: Shelves are organized with a sequence of labels, reading AA, AB, AC, etc. down to ZZ. You look at the shelf next to you. Someone left a key FOB there.

Tokens.innerText: Cabinet is secured with an electronic padlock. Must be valuable stuff in there.
Tokens.text: [Cabinet is secured with an electronic padlock. Must be valuable stuff in there.]

tokens.text: Cabinet is secured with an electronic padlock. Must be valuable stuff in there.

Tokens.innerText: (if: $guard is false)[You look closer at the calendar. Current year, 198X. A date circled says “SHIPMENT TO PORTLAND, OR.” about 3 weeks away.] (else:)[(set: $body to it - 1) You try, but the guard shoots you before you can!]
Tokens.text: [(if: $guard is false)[You look closer at the calendar. Current year, 198X. A date circled says “SHIPMENT TO PORTLAND, OR.” about 3 weeks away.] (else:)[(set: $body to it - 1) You try, but the guard shoots you before you can!]]

tokens.text: [You look closer at the calendar. Current year, 198X. A date circled says “SHIPMENT TO PORTLAND, OR.” about 3 weeks away.]
You look closer at the calendar. Current year, 198X. A date circled says “SHIPMENT TO PORTLAND, OR.” about 3 weeks away.

tokens.innerText: (set: $body to it - 1) You try, but the guard shoots you before you can!
tokens.text: [(set: $body to it - 1) You try, but the guard shoots you before you can!]
You try, but the guard shoots you before you can!

Tokens.innerText: You need a tape player to play the TAPE. [USE TAPE]<ut|
Tokens.text: [You need a tape player to play the TAPE. [USE TAPE]<ut|]

tokens.text: You need a tape player to play the TAPE.

Tokens.innerText:
You put the TAPE into the player, hit play. A gravelly voice. Familiar.
Good day agent, this is your commander. You are in Moscow to infiltrate a research facility that is developing a machine that can alter people’s minds. You have been outfitted with the cyborg implant Total Environmental Transcription/Reactive Information Synthesis, or T.E.T./R.I.S., to aid in your mission. We have also disrupted the facility’s cameras. Good luck.
Tape ends. [USE TAPE]<ut|
Tokens.text:
[You put the TAPE into the player, hit play. A gravelly voice. Familiar.
Good day agent, this is your commander. You are in Moscow to infiltrate a research facility that is developing a machine that can alter people’s minds. You have been outfitted with the cyborg implant Total Environmental Transcription/Reactive Information Synthesis, or T.E.T./R.I.S., to aid in your mission. We have also disrupted the facility’s cameras. Good luck.
Tape ends. [USE TAPE]<ut|]

You have been outfitted with the cyborg implant Total Environmental Transcription/Reactive Information Synthesis, or T.E.T./R.I.S., to aid in your mission. We have also disrupted the facility’s cameras. Good luck.

tokens.innerText: You get into the elevator and descend to the lower floor.
tokens.text: [You get into the elevator and descend to the lower floor.]
You get into the elevator and descend to the lower floor.

Tokens.innerText: You try to HACK the elevator, but no use. Need to turn the power on in the Server Room and disable the security barrier in the Security Room first.
Tokens.text: [You try to HACK the elevator, but no use. Need to turn the power on in the Server Room and disable the security barrier in the Security Room first.]

tokens.text: You try to HACK the elevator, but no use. Need to turn the power on in the Server Room and disable the security barrier in the Security Room first.

Tokens.innerText: You try to HACK the keypad next to the door. Door doesn't open, but you learn the password is long. Too long for underpaid guards to remember.
Tokens.text: [You try to HACK the keypad next to the door. Door doesn't open, but you learn the password is long. Too long for underpaid guards to remember.]

Tokens.text: (if: $location's SERVER is true and $infected is false)

Tokens.innerText:
(set: $infected to true)(set: $power to true)You crack off your middle finger, run a wire from it into the admin terminal. You begin to HACK into the facility’s electrical systems. You find the power controls for the elevator, switch them on.
As you disconnect from the admin terminal, you feel it transfer some packets your way.
You notice strange data in your T.E.T./R.I.S. implant. A malware infection! You need to find an anti-virus CURE, fast!
Tokens.text:
[(set: $infected to true)(set: $power to true)You crack off your middle finger, run a wire from it into the admin terminal. You begin to HACK into the facility’s electrical systems. You find the power controls for the elevator, switch them on.
As you disconnect from the admin terminal, you feel it transfer some packets your way.
You notice strange data in your T.E.T./R.I.S. implant. A malware infection! You need to find an anti-virus CURE, fast!]

tokens.text: You crack off your middle finger, run a wire from it into the admin terminal. You begin to HACK into the facility’s electrical systems. You find the power controls for the elevator, switch them on.
As you disconnect from the admin terminal, you feel it transfer some packets your way.
You notice strange data in your T.E.T./R.I.S. implant. A malware infection! You need to find an anti-virus CURE, fast!

Tokens.innerText:
You pound on the hatch. Springs open. You haul yourself out of the tank.
You’re in a garage. Door to the NORTH, keypad next to it. CAMERA in the northeast and northwest. A desk with several drawers. Feel something in your pocket. You check, find an audio TAPE.

Tokens.innerText: (if: $location's GARAGE is true)[You SHOOT out the cameras. Privacy. Rare thing these days.] (else-if: $location's WAREHOUSE is true)[You SHOOT the security barrier. No effect. Strong stuff.] (else-if: $location's SERVER is true and $open_cab is false)[(set: $open_cab to true) You SHOOT the padlock clean off. Cabinet open.] (else-if: $location's SECURITY is true)[(if: $guard is false)[Hey! Don't just shoot the guy!](else:)[(set: $guard to false) (set: $ser_door to true)(set: $dead_g to true)You SHOOT the guard. His body armor takes the hit, but the shot flings him back. He hits a switch on the console. He's out cold. You hear the elevator security door retract in the warehouse. Convenient.]]

Tokens.text: You enter a warehouse. Shelves of boxes and equipment. To the NORTH, an elevator with no power, sealed with a security door. Next to elevator, a rack with white lab COATS on it. To the EAST, a door labeled “Security Room.” To the WEST, a door labeled “Server Room."

Tokens.innerText: Doesn't look like the guard is following you. Must be pretty drunk
Tokens.text: [Doesn't look like the guard is following you. Must be pretty drunk]

tokens.text: Doesn't look like the guard is following you. Must be pretty drunk

Tokens.innerText: (if: $look_shelf is true)[(if: $inv's FOB is false)[(set: $inv's FOB to true) You nab the key FOB. Should be able to unlock something.](else:)[You already have the FOB.]](else:)[What fob?][TAKE FOB]<tf| [GET FOB]<tf| (click: ?tf)[(append: ?c1)[(display: "Fob_Logic")]]

Tokens.innerText: (set: $infected to false)You grab a stick of CURE, insert it into your data drive. Ahhhh. Sweet anti-virus. Gets all the malware out.
Tokens.text: [(set: $infected to false)You grab a stick of CURE, insert it into your data drive. Ahhhh. Sweet anti-virus. Gets all the malware out.]

tokens.text: You grab a stick of CURE, insert it into your data drive. Ahhhh. Sweet anti-virus. Gets all the malware out.

Tokens.text: You walk into the Security Room. Console of security monitors, currently malfunctioning. Guard crouching under the console, trying to repair them. Large calendar on the wall.
The guard notices you. He stands up, hand goes for a gun at his side. He speaks Russian, which your T.E.T./R.I.S. translates. “Identify yourself!”

Tokens.innerText: The guard’s eyes study your white lab COAT. Hand moves away from gun. “Sorry. Can never remember what you scientists look like. Can’t remember much of anything these days, really. Maybe I should lay off drinking. Anyway, you need to get to the basement?"
Tokens.text: [The guard’s eyes study your white lab COAT. Hand moves away from gun. “Sorry. Can never remember what you scientists look like. Can’t remember much of anything these days, really. Maybe I should lay off drinking. Anyway, you need to get to the basement?"]

tokens.text: The guard’s eyes study your white lab COAT. Hand moves away from gun. “Sorry. Can never remember what you scientists look like. Can’t remember much of anything these days, really. Maybe I should lay off drinking. Anyway, you need to get to the basement?"

Tokens.text: You enter the Server Room. Banks of computers, loud hum from the fans. In front of you, an administrative terminal. Along the wall, a cabinet.

Tokens.innerText: (if: $location's SERVER is true and $open_cab is false)[(set: $open_cab to true) You tap the key FOB onto the padlock. Cabinet swings open. Inside you find cables, dongles, a LOG of warehouse contents.]

Tokens.innerText: (if: $guard is false and $dead_g is false)[(if: $ser_door is false)[(set: $ser_door to true)”I’ll disable the security door on the elevator. Careful working too hard down there. I don’t want to have to drag you up here unconscious and screaming again.” Guard flips a switch on the console, you hear the elevator security door retract in the warehouse.](else:)[Guard is passed out. Doesn't look like he can talk right now.]](else-if: $dead_g is false)[(set: $body to it - 1)You try, but the guard shoots you before you can!]

”I’ll disable the security door on the elevator. Careful working too hard down there. I don’t want to have to drag you up here unconscious and screaming again.” Guard flips a switch on the console, you hear the elevator security door retract in the warehouse.

tokens.innerText: Guard is passed out. Doesn't look like he can talk right now.
tokens.text: [Guard is passed out. Doesn't look like he can talk right now.]
Guard is passed out. Doesn't look like he can talk right now.

tokens.innerText: (set: $body to it - 1)You try, but the guard shoots you before you can!
tokens.text: [(set: $body to it - 1)You try, but the guard shoots you before you can!]
You try, but the guard shoots you before you can!
